films.title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
films.lead: In the 1930s, the Grand Budapest Hotel is a popular European ski resort, presided over by concierge Gustave H. (Ralph Fiennes).
films.desc: Gustave prides himself on providing first-class service to the hotel's guests, including satisfying the sexual needs of the many elderly women who stay there.

reviews.text: Discerning travellers and Wes Anderson fans will luxuriate in the glorious Mittel-European kitsch of one of the director's.
reviews.author: Kate Muir
